thread.title: Anthony Ozoagu
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Anthony Ozoagu

author: Anthony Ozoagu
title: Anthony Ozoagu
text: We needed to a do a migration of plan ,i chatted with Allen Gibson from there site and he was able to break down what we need to do .He made the whole process look so easy . We have been using the host company for 2 years and they have been excellent .Love them so much
